titles.title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of the Army to acquire land adjacent to Abiquiu Dam in New Mexico.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16216)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Limits the authority of the Secretary of the Army to acquire land adjacent to Abiquiu Dam in New Mexico to purchase from willing sellers.
